# setLoops(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets a Boolean value indicating whether the movie plays in a continuous loop.

## Declaration

```swift
func setLoops(_ loops: Bool)
```

## Parameters

- **loops**: A Boolean value indicating the looping behavior. Specify [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to play the movie in a continuous loop or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to play the movie once and then stop playback. Defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Setting Movie Properties

- **setAutoplays(_:)**: Sets a Boolean value indicating whether the movie automatically begins playing as soon as the scene is presented.
- **setMovieURL(_:)**: Sets the URL of the movie to play.
- **setPosterImage(_:)**: Sets the poster image to display for the movie.
- **setVideoGravity(_:)**: Sets the resizing behavior for the movie content.
